summary: Garnet, 8 years old, has a father who has difficulty showing him love, since Garnet's mother died during his birth. Only getting affection by his 16 year old sister Flower, the situation changes when she leaves when she gets pregnant.
cast: Callum Keith Rennie|Jane McGregor|Alisha Penev|Colin Roberts|Dov Tiefenbach|Kristen Thomson|Craig Olejnik|Chilton Crane|Philip Granger|Arnie Walters|Eliza Norbury|Allan Lysell|Mitra Loraz|Linsea O'Shea|Dimitri Milani|Gerald W. Behrman|Bill Perry|Don Connors|Lois Archer-Dhell
title: Flower & Garnet
